desc: Sleepers are flip flops made of Fair Trade natural rubber. Our eco-friendly alternative. They are produced with care for the environment and the workers who are part of the process. We have four different models - Tapered, Slim, Slim Wide Strap and Mens. Find your favorite at shop-sleepers.com

layout.text:
Eco Friendly, Fairly Traded,
Premium Grade Natural Rubber
Flip Flops
